General.Name: Clean & Carbon Energy S.A.
General.Description: Clean&Carbon Energy S.A. provides hard coal mining and related services. It also buys, sells, leases, and manages real estate properties, as well as extracts peats. The company was formerly known as Karen SA and changed its name to Clean&Carbon Energy S.A.in September 2010. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
